headline: How To Earn $500 A Month From Walgreens Stock Ahead Of Q2 Earnings
summary: Walgreens Boots Alliance, Inc. (NASDAQ:WBA) will release earnings results for the second quarter, before the opening bell on Tuesday, April 8. Analysts expect the company to report quarterly earnings at 53 cents per share, down from $1.2 per share in the year-ago period. According to data from Benzinga Pro, Walgreens projects quarterly revenue at $38.0 billion, compared to $37.05 billion a year earlier. headline: Walgreens: Cost-Saving Measures Seem To Be Working (Rating Upgrade)
summary: Walgreens Boots Alliance, Inc.'s recent cost-saving measures have shown some progress, judging by several key operating metrics. Read why WBA stock is a hold.
